Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay, So central!”
Reviews.Author: Ryan T
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel unsure arrived amazingly central madrid access main metro line sol mere 150 yard walk corner clean air con modern hotel recommend staff friendly efficient

Reviews.Title: “Surprise surprise surprise”
Reviews.Author: Aini_1972
Reviews.Content: location steps puerto de sol surprised conditions hostal 4 spacious nice black white decor clean amenities including mini fridge toilets clean towels changed daily arrived happy 1 check immediately reception helpful assisting book flamenco call taxi morning destination breakfast price served cafe hostal centrally located walk shopping districts puerto de sol gran via plaza mayor walk tourist including museo del prado thumbs

Reviews.Title: “Hosta Alhambra Suites. Pretty Good.”
Reviews.Author: pkou
Reviews.Content: looked scary dodgy ally hotel walk inside pretty cool location central easy takes vintage modern day stylish look bedroom sized interior pretty nice hostal front service desk nice provided service left anal due stress horrible view

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: NF2010
Reviews.Content: stayed hostal 4 nights overall pleasant hotel location close pretty barely public transportation modern clean disliked noise morning hear showers closer ours hear people hall theis suitcases leaving hotel didnt enjoy breakfast served restaurant close wasnt continetal style coffee toast staff helpfull except tried recomendation restaurant eat spanish meal recomend restaurant breakfast knowing wasnt spanish guess deal told dinned saying overall enjoyed stay recomend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Two thumbs up!”
Reviews.Author: jjua543
Reviews.Content: enjoyed hotel steps plaza del sol closer food fun booked hotel days arrived madrid nights week vacation spain hotel clean kept nice condition spacious bathroom modern balcony people watching staff friendly breakfast included hotel rate site restaurant corner choice sandwich selection fruit cheese coffee fresh oj plenty start day time madrid stay steps action stay youll love
